REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f6031 reute h f BC-MASSCOMP-<MSCP>,-VI-I 03-17 0047

TEXT.TITLE: MASSCOMP <MSCP>, VI IN DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Masscomp said it reached a joint marketing relationship to promote and sell V.I. Corp's line of DataView s Graphics Software Products. MassComp said it will promote the products to key government and commercial accounts. Reuter
